column2: Key Responsibilities: 1)New Store Openings: Collaborate with the leadership team to develop and execute strategies for new store openings, ensuring consistent growth and expansion. Oversee all aspects of new store launches, including site selection, store layout design, staffing, and inventory management. 2)Sales and Profitability Management: Drive sales and profitability of existing stores through data-driven analysis, trend interpretation, and effective sales forecasting and planning. Utilize data analytics and industry insights to identify opportunities for improvement and implement strategies to enhance store performance. 3)Business Analysis: Perform all duties of a Business Analyst, delivering comprehensive dashboards and insightful reports to management for data-driven decision-making. Prepare market and competition analysis reports to identify improvement areas and implement best practices. 4)Promotions and Offers: Initiate strategic store offers and promotions aligned with business objectives to increase footfall and revenue. Collaborate with the marketing team to execute promotional campaigns effectively. 5)Operational Excellence: Define and implement store policies and processes to ensure productivity, high-quality customer experience, and operational efficiency. Maintain end-to-end control of third-party POS software and coordinate all technical requirements. 6)Merchandising and Product Assortment: Coordinate merchandising efforts to curate the ideal product assortment for existing and upcoming stores, enhancing customer appeal and sales performance. 7)Team Leadership and Training: Lead talent acquisition and training efforts to build high-performing store teams that deliver exceptional customer service. Provide ongoing coaching and development opportunities to store staff. 8)Visual Merchandising:  Oversee visual merchandising and in-store communications in collaboration with category teams to enhance brand image and product presentation. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Retail Management, or related field (preferred). Proven experience in retail operations management, preferably in a multi-store environment. Strong leadership, strategic planning, and analytical skills. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Proficiency in data analysis and business intelligence tools. Ability to travel extensively within the PAN India region.
column11: retail operations, Operational Excellence, Sales, Visual Merchandising, Profitability Management, Retail Management, Merchandising, Business Analysis, strategic planning

column2: GMR Hyderabad Airport is looking  for retail accounts Manager. Role & responsibilities     Work alongside concessionaires towards   achieving targeted sales.   Planning and executing key marketing   events with the involvement of concessionaires leading to higher visibility   and exposure for maximizing sales.   Monthly performance reviews with   concessionaires to address details like What went well, areas of   improvement, existing merchandise line, sales target, UPT, staff productivity   & stock density and new launches   in the future.  Improve operational efficiency &   address concessionaire grievances.   Regular mall/high street visits &   competition and sister airport visits in order to see, understand, learn and   implement best practices being followed & conduct competition mapping   with a clear objective to be better than the competition in terms of product   offering, passenger experience which eventually would lead to higher sales.    Category and sub category analysis to   identify growth opportunities. Identification of new sub category gaps   based on the regular passenger research & profiling.   Negotiations for better revenues from   contracts due for renewal (existing concessionaires)    Constantly looking at innovative   initiatives which are undertaken (Airport exclusive offers & products,   End of season sales with Flat 50% sales, special discounts/offers for airport   community, tie ups among concessionaires for cross promotion leading for   enhanced visibility)   Ensure that all the concessionaires   adhere to all the compliances (eg: Timely security deposit payments, audited   revenue statement submissions, SOP & EPOS adherence)   Making sure that the RFB audits are   conducted and the corrections pointed out in the same are closed, thus   ensuring that the store look & feel and ambience is intact therefore   leading to customer/passenger delight.   Ensuring that all the concessionaires   adhere to the statutory & legal compliances of the state & central   government such weights & measures, trade licenses, etc.   Receivables management. Preferred candidate profile   Candidate having experience working across various global brands for sales and operations of their hubs and store.

column2: Responsible for producing and presenting food items to meet customer and client expectations and Sodexo India standards as well as maintain and continuously improve the efficiency and profitability of the operation.     Ensure that safety and hygiene policy is strictly followed at the site     Control the quantity and quality of the ingredients and ensure that all items     are received as per the laid down specifications; responsible for training the receiving area staff on ingredient quality     Responsible for maintaining record of all hygiene related procedures, initiatives and incidents     Responsible for co-ordination with the QMHSE and H&FS teams to implement the policy and process     Ensure that all incidents pertaining to QMHSE and H&FS are reported to the concerned teams on time     Operational ownership of all the QMHSE and H&FS processes     Timely communication of all possible on site hazards to the concerned department       Key Responsibilities     Food Operation       Ensure that all the service deliveries are carried out as per the terms and conditions agreed upon with the client.     Manage the menu recipes rotation for breakfast, lunch, snacks, dinner and special events     Initiate development of new menus, upgrade old menus and special event Menus     Taste the food before service begins Develop new ideas for promotions, festivals and other special events     Plan the pre-preparation area to ensure that the items are processed according to the recipes     Consistently maintain standards of quality, cost, presentation, and flavor of foods       Organic Growth and Profitability       Ensure organic growth of sales and sites by developing and promoting service excellence, retail offers and value added offers     Sustain and build site profitability through timely analysis of reports and Provide solutions to counter any discrepancies.       Cash and Debtors Management       Responsible for accurate control, handover and deposition of cash; maintain accurately all the specified cash control documents     Ensure that all the invoices are raised and delivered to the client as per Schedule       People Management and Training       Manage the on-site team including cooks, MPWs, stewards, cashiers, Stores assistants etc.     Ensure that all the HR processes and staff welfare activities are implemented and carried out       Communication and Client Retention       Stay in close communication with the client for all issues regarding services, additional business, new initiatives and hygiene and prepare documents of the same       Ensure 100% client retention       Wastage Control and Cost Management     Maintain a record of the daily leftovers; plan and prepare the production based on this data     Minimise wastage and able to recycle excess ingredients for other dishes in accordance with the highest hygiene standards       Legal Compliances       Co-ordinate with the HR, QMHSE and Legal departments to ensure that all the legal compliances are met with and a copy of the same is maintained     Systems Implementation and Process Management     Ensure that all the systems and processes are implemented and followed as per the company policy     Ensure that all the work processes are documented and displayed     Procurement and Inventory Management     Responsible for monitoring the daily raw material indent       Qualification:       Should be IHM pass out with 4+ yrs of work experience     Strong in business acumen     Commitment to quality     Strong financial and budgeting skills     Sound written and verbal communication     Well-groomed and able to represent Sodexo in a professional manner     Should have strong interpersonal skills & be very Customer focused'

column2: Job Title : Commercial Manager  Location :   Mumbai Sales and Demo Management: 1. Sales and Demo Forecasting and Management: Develop and maintain launch and demo forecasts based on market trends, historical data, and promotional activities. Ensure effective utilization of resources for demos and monitor their performance. Evaluate the success of demo activities based on predefined metrics. 2. Launch Forecast: Prepare launch forecasts for new product releases. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure adequate stock levels and promotional support. 3. Sales Monitoring: Continuously monitor sales performance and analyze trends. Identify areas for improvement and implement strategies to achieve sales targets. Regularly review and adjust inventory levels based on sales trends. Financial and Commercial Management:  4. Financial Management: Oversee financial transactions, including revenue, expenses, and profit margins. Review financial statements and ensure compliance with financial policies and standards. Manage and control all store-related expenses, including rent, utility bills, and petty cash. Develop cost-effective strategies to reduce operational expenses while maintaining high service standards. Cash SOP and Stock Management: Develop and enforce standard operating procedures for cash handling. Manage stock levels, including replenishment, stockouts, and returns. Implement stock rotation strategies to minimize obsolescence. 6. Warehouse Coordination for Stock: Collaborate with the warehouse team to maintain an efficient stock management system. Ensure the accuracy of stock records and coordinate stock transfers between the warehouse and the store. Store Operations:  7. Store Administration and Cleaning: Supervise the overall administration of the retail store, ensuring it runs smoothly. Clearing all admin bills on time. Oversee cleanliness and hygiene standards to create a pleasant shopping environment. Settlements with Pine Labs and Classification: Manage and reconcile all transactions with Pine Labs, ensuring accurate accounting and classification. Develop and implement processes to streamline settlement procedures. Vendor and Compliance Management:  9. Vendor Management: Establish and maintain effective relationships with suppliers and negotiate favorable terms. Monitor vendor performance and ensure timely deliveries of products. 10. Compliance and Regulatory Requirements: Ensure the retail store's compliance with all relevant laws and regulations. Stay up-to-date with changing compliance requirements and implement necessary changes. Security:  11. Loss Prevention:  - Develop and enforce loss prevention measures to safeguard store assets.  - Implement security protocols and monitor surveillance systems. Interested Candidates can share your updated cv at aditi.mathur@partner.samsung.com

column2: As a Founding Manager - Retail Operations at Orange Health, you will play a crucial role in building and maintaining our authorized collection centers and you will collaborate closely with our founders, leadership & cross-functional teams, requiring you to build innovative solutions to build a retail experience in diagnostics that delivers a wow to the customer, and drives sustainable revenue growth.            Why you might be excited about us          We are on a mission to build the fastest diagnostic lab in India.      We have a bunch of Talented folks who relentlessly work towards bringing a WOW customer experience. Rated currently at 4.9/5      Our team has a wide range of experience .Folks at OH have worked earlier with companies like Phonepe, Flipkart, Practo, Unacademy, Swiggy, Metropolis, Licious, cure.fit etc. and we are excited to learn from you too.      We care for your career & growth and hence we will help you to shape a career you are excited about.      We work hard and we party harder. Our People NPS is >90% and Glassdoor rating is also in the top 90% of companies.      Competitive Pay + ESOPs          What will you get to do?          Build the strategy, SOP and execution for Orange Health s retail operations        Build the retail operations from 0 to 1, creating a scalable and profitable playbook for Orange Health. You ll be    working closely with the founders and leadership to execute this successfully.      As part of this, it will involve all aspects of retail: identifying potential locations, identifying the right TG, driving demand, P&L, building SOPs, driving the metrics across stores & teams.        Collaborate with cross-functional teams and come up with strategies for marketing, branding and inventory management          Innovate and create the best experience for our customers at Authorized Collection Centers.          Create, develop, and implement a business growth expansion strategy for ACC s and improve the optimal use of resources.          Manage operations and simultaneously focus on opening new stores as a part of business expansion strategy.            Metrics for the role          Store metrics: topline, bottomline, NPS      Store expansion: Number of stores      Omnichannel play: customer retention          Skills we are looking for          4+ years of relevant experience in retail operations, expansion and omni-channel management.      Comfort in getting your hands dirty and driving impact on the ground.      Strong analytical and financial modeling skills.      Strong communication and Negotiation skills.      Knowledge of local real estate markets and regulatory environments.      Experience in Franchising is preferred.

column2: Role & responsibilities    -   Overall Store Management:  Supervise and oversee all aspects of retail         operations, including sales, customer service, inventory         management, and employee performance.  Sales and Performance Management:  Set sales targets, develop strategies to achieve         them, and monitor performance metrics. Provide guidance and         support to sales staff to ensure targets are met or exceeded. Customer Experience:  Ensure a high level of customer satisfaction by         maintaining excellent service standards, resolving customer         complaints effectively, and implementing initiatives to enhance         the overall shopping experience.  Inventory Management:  Oversee inventory levels, ordering, and         replenishment to ensure adequate stock levels while minimizing         excess inventory. Implement inventory control measures to reduce         shrinkage and losses.  Staff Management and Development:  Recruit, train, and supervise retail staff.         Provide ongoing coaching, feedback, and performance evaluations         to foster a motivated and high-performing team. Develop training         programs to enhance employee skills and product knowledge. Visual Merchandising:  Coordinate with the visual merchandising team to         ensure attractive product displays and store layouts that drive         sales and reflect the brand's image. Financial Management:  Manage the store budget effectively,         including monitoring expenses, analyzing sales data, and         identifying opportunities to increase profitability.    Strategic Partnerships and Alliances:  Identify potential partners, such as suppliers,         distributors, or complementary businesses, to collaborate on         joint ventures, promotions, or co-marketing efforts. Develop and         nurture relationships to leverage mutual benefits and drive         growth.  New Product Development:  Work closely with product development teams to         innovate and introduce new products or services that meet         customer needs and align with market trends. Conduct market         testing and gather feedback to refine offerings before launch.  Expansion Planning:          Evaluate opportunities for expanding retail locations, whether         through opening new stores, franchising, or entering new         markets. Develop expansion strategies, considering factors such         as demographics, competition, and economic conditions.  Competitive Analysis:  Monitor competitors' activities, pricing         strategies, and market positioning to identify areas of         competitive advantage and potential threats. Adjust business         strategies accordingly to maintain a competitive edge.  Compliance and Safety:  Ensure compliance with company policies and         procedures, as well as local regulations. Maintain a safe and         clean store environment for both customers and employees.

column2: Overview: As the Regional Operations Manager for India, you will be responsible for overseeing the operational efficiency and aesthetic standards of all showrooms within the region. Your primary objective will be to manage showroom facility operations, lead a team of facility managers, and enhance the interior and exterior presentation of showrooms in alignment with marketing strategies and brand guidelines. Key Responsibilities: Showrooms Facility Operations: ?Oversee all aspects of entire India showroom facility operations, including maintenance, repairs, security, and cleanliness, to ensure smooth day-to-day operations and optimal functionality. Team Leadership: ?Lead and mentor a team of facility managers and support staff, providing guidance, support, and training to ensure high standards of performance and professionalism. Interior and Exterior Presentation: ?Enhance the interior and exterior presentation of showrooms to align with marketing strategies and brand guidelines, ensuring a visually appealing and cohesive brand experience for customers. Space Planning and Layout: ?Manage showroom layout, space utilization, and signage placement to optimize traffic flow, product visibility, and customer engagement, while also accommodating operational needs. Vendor Management: ?Collaborate with vendors, suppliers, and service providers for interior and exterior maintenance, renovations, and installations, ensuring timely and cost-effective delivery of services. Budget Management: ?Develop and manage budgets for showroom maintenance, renovations, and improvements, ensuring expenditures are within budgetary constraints and aligned with operational goals. Compliance and Safety: ?Ensure compliance with health, safety, and building code regulations, conducting regular inspections and implementing corrective actions as needed to maintain a safe and secure environment for staff and customers. Continuous Improvement: ?Identify opportunities for process optimization, cost savings, and efficiency improvements related to showroom operations and facility management, and implement best practices accordingly. Communication and Collaboration: ?Foster collaboration and communication with cross-functional teams, including marketing, merchandising, and sales, to ensure alignment of showroom operations with overall business objectives and strategies. Performance Monitoring and Reporting: ?Monitor and analyze key performance metrics related to showroom operations, facility management, and customer satisfaction, and provide regular reports and updates to senior management. Qualification: Bachelor's degree in Facilities Management, Business Administration, or a related field. Master's degree preferred. Proven experience in facility management, operations management, or related fields, with a track record of success in leading teams and improving showroom standards. Strong leadership and management skills, with the ability to inspire and motivate teams to achieve high standards of performance. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with internal and external stakeholders. Sound knowledge of building codes, safety regulations, and facility maintenance best practices. Ability to travel within the region as needed to visit showrooms and oversee operations. Conclusion: As the Regional Operations Manager for India, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring the operational efficiency and aesthetic standards of all showrooms within the region. Your leadership and expertise will contribute to creating exceptional customer experiences and driving business success across multiple locations while aligning with marketing strategies and brand guidelines.

column2: Area Sales Manager Company:  Specsmakers Opticians Pvt Ltd Location:  Chennai/Coimbatore/ Visakhapatnam About Us:  Specsmakers is a leading retail optical store company dedicated to providing high-quality eyewear products and exceptional customer service. With a strong presence in the retail market, we are committed to enhancing the vision and style of our customers through innovative products and personalized experiences. Job Description:  We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Area Sales Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for overseeing the sales operations of multiple retail optical stores within a designated area. Key Responsibilities: Manage and supervise the sales team across multiple retail optical stores to achieve sales targets and maximize revenue. Develop and implement sales strategies and action plans to drive business growth and expansion within the assigned area. Train, coach, and motivate sales staff to ensure they have the necessary skills and knowledge to effectively promote products and provide excellent customer service. Conduct regular store visits to monitor performance, assess operational efficiency, and provide feedback and support to store managers and sales associates. Analyze sales data, market trends, and competitor activities to identify opportunities for improvement and develop strategies to stay ahead of the competition. Collaborate with marketing and merchandising teams to plan and execute promotional activities, product launches, and store displays to drive sales and enhance brand visibility. Ensure compliance with company policies, procedures, and standards across all retail stores, including inventory management, pricing, and customer service. Build and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders, including store managers, staff, customers, and suppliers, to foster a positive working environment and achieve business objectives. Prepare regular reports and presentations on sales performance, market trends, and operational activities to senior management and other relevant stakeholders. Stay updated on industry developments, market dynamics, and customer preferences to anticipate changes and adapt strategies accordingly. Benefits: Competitive salary package Incentives and Bonus Health insurance coverage Opportunities for career growth and development Positive and collaborative work environment If you are a dynamic leader with a passion for driving sales growth and delivering exceptional customer experiences, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity. Join us in shaping the future of Specsmakers and revolutionizing the optical retail industry with innovative sales strategies.

column1: Market Manager - Reliance Smart Grocery Stores
column2: Dear Jobseekers Greetings from  Reliance Retail Limited HIRING for "Market Manager" -Grocery Store (Large/Small Reliance Smart Format)" We are looking for a dynamic professional with excellent communication skills and in-depth experience in back-end & front-end retail operations. Should possess expertise in functions like Operations, Merchandising, Customer Service, Quality Control, Inventory Management, Team Management, Store P&L, Revenue Generation and Customer Complaint handling. Preferred Industry:  Retail, QSR and FMCG/Hospitality Role & responsibilities  :   Execute retail operations in the store and ensure adherence to all standard operating procedures of the company.  Lead team in establishment of a distribution and wholesale network for that territory with a key review of the distributor coverage and efficiencies resulting in key deliverable Profiling of every large retailer , wholesaler within the database and initial coverage to ascertain interest and enrolling prospects and leveraging potential Analysis of industry and market competition and establish key strategies to convert the universe base to customer base Forecasting sales, and allocating sales target to team. Analyze and keep abreast of the customer buying behavior, trends/forecast and market development through regular market, store, and vendor visits Train team on product awareness and capture market with distributor coverage Lead team in recruitment and on boarding of Store operations manpower. Responsible for achieving state level sales primary and secondary targets, and delivery of high-quality customer service to existing and potential customers. Maintain good cross functional business partnering team. Suggesting cross functional team with better product quality and competitive market schemes, to pull more sales from the assigned state territory. Be a people person to guide team for performance achievement. Manage Dump & Shrink in the store Willing to relocate anywhere in Rajasthan. Note:- Candidate must have relevant experience min 6+ Years with Retail/QSR/Hospitality. Candidates from QSR can also apply. Candidates should be ready to relocate anywhere in  Rajasthan  including Tier 3-4 cities . Candidates can also drop their CVs directly to   harsh.mitruka@ril.com & Ved.mishra@ril.com  with Subject line as "MM-Smart"
